name: Dooms day robotic
description:
One day a monster has appear and kills a bunch of people, so humanity created a weapon call the robotic in order to kills all the monster that has appear in the earth. The robotic need controllers to control each part of the robot, when the robot gets attack the eject system will be executed. The controllers has to assemble controllers back  again to control the robotic correctly!

Good luck, controller!

Control:

WASD - run

Left-click - Attack

Right-click - Dash

Goal :

Kill monsters as much as you can and try to assemble the controllers in order control movement freely.

A game by trizG_

A submission for Godot wild jam #53
